name: Battle of the Cubes
description:
A fun little battle game we are working on. Check in for more features and updates.
The bugs are definitely intended :D

Player 1: 
W - Jump
A - Left
D - Right

Player 2:
Up Arrow - Jump
Left Arrow - Left
Right Arrow - Right

Music:
BoxCat Games - Battle Boss
Broke For Free - Something Elated
Graphiqs Groove - Deep Sky Blue
Rolemusic - The Pirate And The Dancer
All from https://freemusicarchive.org/

Font: Riffic Bold from https://www.fontspring.com/fonts/inky-type/riffic/riffic-bold
